title: How Long Should You Wait to Reply to a Text? Texting Etiquette for Crushes and More

steps.title: That way, you won't leave them hanging or forget to respond.
steps.content: That way, you won't leave them hanging or forget to respond. It can be easy to forget about a message until later on if it gets lost in your notifications.
